commit_list.message: add gem version badge to README
add code climate badge to README
Fill in TODO information in Gemspec

Show helpers for plural resources now use the return value of 'to_s' of the last argument provided as a default label [#2]:
So now you can write show_event(event) instead of show_event(event, :label => event.name) after implementing to_s to return the event's name
commit_list.repo_description: ResourcefulViews aims to take RESTful conventions beyond controllers and into views by extending the 'map.resources' method to install a comprehensive vocabulary of resource-oriented view helpers

commit_list.message:
Partially implemented feature [#1] - the :attributes option is now 'aliased' to :with,
so that you can write: create_user :with => {:name => 'Fred'}

commit_list.message:
Simplified list helpers:
There is now only one list helper: [resource]_list
'id' attribute is set with the :id option
use :ordered => true to render an ordered list

commit_list.message: Fixed incompatibility of tests with Rails 3.0.0.beta4
Fixed setting of 'skip-route' option in scaffold generator invocations
Added integration test generating app with nested resources (blog)
Figured out how to make ruby based (non-cli) invocation of generator work and switched back to it
Switched back to CLI-invocation of scaffold generator since direct instantiation can't parse array option (scope) correctly...
Fixed controller option in singleton resource routes
list estimates sorted by estimate and estimator
add code climate badge to README
add gem version badge to README
ensure correct order of multi-line responses
respond with helpful message when attempting to show estimates or estimators when no estimates are available yet
add 'reset_estimators' route for resetting estimates for a story
add 'show_estimators' route for listing everyone who has estimated the story (without the estimates)
allow a wide range of story id formats
confirm valid estimates, and reject invalid ones
refactor to use redis hash for storage
add 'show estimates' route with simple retrieval of estimation results
add 'estimate' route and simple persistence of estimate
Renamed 'Rails.application.resources' to 'Rails.application.resource_definitions' and ActionController#resource to ActionController#resource_definition
commit_list.repo_description: Makes information about a Rails application's resources (as defined via the 'resource(s)' routing DSL methods) available via Rails.application.resources

commit_list.message: Made catalog creation and update feature pass
Added devise views and started devise layout
Attempts to fix broken build (tests passing locally)
Switched to using the 'gem_patching' gem for managing gem patches
Page now accepts nested attributes for article
Controllers now inherit from ApplicationController (version bump to 0.0.4)
Moved scaffold view generation into 'ingoweiss:scaffold_views' generator
Extracted before filter method for scope collection in scoped controllers
Controllers for resources without attributes now only have the necessary code
Removed accidentally checked in gem file

iwg is now installed in host app via Gemfile (:path option)
Added Railtie (empty)
Fixed some deprecation warnings after upgrading to Rails 3.0.0.beta3
Fixed rendering of entry partials on index views
Fixed crash in 'new' view for nested singleton resources
Added injection of link to children into parent resource show views
Completed scaffolding for creation of plural resources
Implemented generation of 'show' views for unscoped plural resources
Implemented generaton for 'new' views for unscoped plural resources
Added reference templates to migration generation tests
Implemented generation of model and migration
Implemented controller generation for singleton resource nested two levels deep
Implemented controller generation for nested(scoped) resources
controller generation for unscoped resource working

repo_list.description: Better management of patches for specific versions of other gems
ResourcefulViews aims to take RESTful conventions beyond controllers and into views by extending the 'map.resources' method to install a comprehensive vocabulary of resource-oriented view helpers
